first_para: Charles Geoffrey Cox, QC, MP (born 30 April 1960) is an English barrister who, as a Conservative Party Member of Parliament (MP), has been representing the constituency of Torridge and West Devon since 2005.

full.extract:
Charles Geoffrey Cox, QC, MP (born 30 April 1960) is an English barrister who, as a Conservative Party Member of Parliament (MP), has been representing the constituency of Torridge and West Devon since 2005.
^ "List of Members Returned to Serve in Parliament at the General Election 2010" (London Gazette, 13 May 2010)
full.title: Geoffrey Cox (British politician)
